result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody Randell Brown

records.addlTxt: Signed by def and Atty Dolfi. mw

11:36 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Cody Randell Brown. Defendant Cody Randell Brown in court. Includes 19CF609 and 22CF112. Court reviews case. recites resolution. Court questions Defendant. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to AMENDED Count 1: Possession of Amphetamine- 961.41(3g)(d) in case 22CF112 and Count 3: Possession of THC- 961.41(3g)(e) in case 22CF112. Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty. Upon motion of the State, Court dismisses Counts 2 and 4 in 22CF112. Court vacates and revokes DJOC in 19CF609. Sentencing arguments. 

Court Orders:
19CF609 Count 1: W/S 2 years Probation

- 180 days condition time STAYED
- Court Costs: $268.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
8 days credit against ultimate sentence

22CF112 Count 1: I/S 6 months jail

2 years probation
- 60 days condition time STAYED
- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
- DNA Surcharge: $200.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
2 days credit against ultimate sentence

22CF112 Count 3: W/ S 2 years Probation
- 60 days condition time STAYED
- Court Costs: $268.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through probation
2 days credit against ultimate sentence

Conditions of Probation:

- DNA Sample
- AODA/ Rule 25 within 30 Days and follow through with recommendations
- Cooperate with any other evaluation, assessment and/or program as requested
- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Prescribed medications only as prescribed
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol
- Not to possess a firearm
- Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license
- Subject to random UA's and PBT's
- Follow rules and regulations of Agent
- Pay supervision fees
- Sign up for probation on 11/01/22 by 01:30 PM 

Adjourned 11:58 AM
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 1, 2022 at 11:45 am.

9:40 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Cody Randell Brown. Defendant Cody Randell Brown not in court. Set for PLEAS. Includes 19CF609 and 22CF112. Court reviews case. Atty Dolfi states DE was having transportation issues and requests to stayed warrant. ADA Becker has no objection to stayed warrant. Court sets PLEAS. Court issues Warrant- stayed until 11/01/22. Adjourned 09:45 AM
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 11:45 am.

2:31 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Cody Randell Brown. Defendant Cody Randell Brown appeared by video. Includes 19CF609 and 22CF112. Court reviews case. Atty Dolfi states there is a resolution. ADA Becker states 19CF609 is a RMW case but gave permission for Brach 2 to hear case as a global resolution. Court sets PLEAS.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 7, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:06 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox,  Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Cody Randell Brown in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Cody Randell Brown.  Requests to be scheduled with Branch II file, 2019CF609. Court approves Branch II to hear file for global resolution. Bond continues and address is confirmed.
Status conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on September 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
for DE to appear by zoom for PTC, filed by Atty Dolfi.  Per RMW on 8/1/22: Zoom approved. JA advised attorney. bph
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi   DF:  Cody Randell Brown appeared. OFF RECORD. Scheduling only.  Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Filed by ADA Becker. mw
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Michael Joseph Becker   DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi   DF:  Cody Randell Brown appeared. Case called at 3:33 p.m. Court notes this matter is set for a preliminary hearing. ADA Becker calls Deputy Krueger to the Stand. S/T Nick Krueger. Employed with the St Croix County Sheriff's Department. Direct by ADA Becker. Witness identifies DE in the courtroom. Record will reflect identification. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Witness excused. No further evidence. No argument. ADA Becker requesting Court take judicial notice of the bond in St Croix file 19CF609. Court will take notice. Atty Dolfi would like to continue with the arraignment if the information mirrors complaint. ADA Becker will file information. Atty Dolfi will enter a NG plea. Court schedules. Address confirmed. Bond continues. Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Filed by Atty Dolfi. km

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Holly Rockow   DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi and Kaitlin Dippolito  DF:  Cody Randell Brown appeared from jail via zoom. DE has a copy of complaint. Address and DOB confirmed.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands everything but the felony bail jumping. Court gives explanation. Qualifies for PD services. Court schedules for preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
